abstract: 'Morning paper' follows the production of an issue of 'The Times' during the Blitz, from the daily editorial conference to the printing presses.
description: The story of a newspaper during wartime. Shows how the news is gathered and prepared for the press in spite of the threat of bombs. Describes the composition and checking of the pages, the creation of curved steroes to fit the rotary presses and various other tasks that must be completed before the paper can be put to bed.
